repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:4.4.2 
MAINTAINER alienblog@outlook.com 

RUN \  
mkdir -p /opt/p2p 

ADD . /opt/p2p 

WORKDIR /opt/p2p 

RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

ENV MYSQL_ADDR localhost 
ENV MYSQL_PORT 3306 
ENV MYSQL_USER p2pspider 
ENV MYSQL_PWD p2pspider 
ENV MYSQL_DBNAME p2pspider 

EXPOSE 6881 
ENTRYPOINT ["node", "app.js"]
